label.hintText.enter.title: Keyboard hint text for navigating to next question

label.hintText.multipleSelection.title: Hint for multiple selection
label.hintText.multipleSelection.default: Choose as many as you like

block.dropdown.placeholder.title: Placeholder for dropdown
block.dropdown.placeholder.default: Please format or select an option

block.dropdown.placeholderTouch.title: Placeholder for dropdown on touch screens

block.longText.hint.title: Hint for line break in Long Text fields
block.longText.hint.default: Shift ⇧ + Enter ↵ to make a line break

label.hintText.key.title: Keyboard hint after hovering over options

label.errorAlert.number.title: If non numeric value is passed

label.errorAlert.selectionRequired.title: If answer needs at least one selection
label.errorAlert.selectionRequired.default: Please make at least one selection!

label.errorAlert.range.title: If number is out of range
label.errorAlert.range.default: Please enter a number between {{attribute:min}} and {{attribute:max}}

label.errorAlert.minNum.title: If number is lower than minimum value
label.errorAlert.minNum.default: Please enter a number greater than {{attribute:min}}

label.errorAlert.maxNum.title: If number is higher than maximum value
label.errorAlert.maxNum.default: Please enter a number lower than {{attribute:max}}

label.errorAlert.maxCharacters.title: If characters number is higher than maximum value

label.errorAlert.noConnection.title: Error for no connection with server
label.errorAlert.noConnection.default: Can"t connect to the server right now!

label.errorAlert.serverError.title: Error for a problem with server
